list.text: This message is a fallback. If you see this, please submit a bug report.

Hello [player_name]! Welcome in the awesome world of Spectral Frontiers! You are going to discover a world filled with darkness, betrayals and epic battles. You will not be alone to face all the challenges the world keeps secret!

The game is designed to be used with a keyboard, not a gamepad. Most things need to be clicked with your mouse, but if you don't understand something or if you just want to leave a comment, please do it on our official website, via the contact page, many thanks and enjoy the game!
This goblin is blinded by hate, let's put an end to his madness.
Well... I guess it's here, but I don't see them.
...and as you know, if you pull just a bit...
Always this farmer... let's give him a lesson!
